articles.title: There is no way Jayson Tatum returning to the Celtics this season could be a bad thing
articles.description:
Getting a player of Tatum’s magnitude and versatility back — even if he’s rusty, and even if he’s on a minutes limit — only enhances the possibility of a satisfying June.

The post There is no way Jayson Tatum returning to the Celtics this season could be a bad thing appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Jayson Tatum is set to return to the Celtics this season, boosting team morale.
Tatum's versatility enhances the Celtics' chances for a successful playoff run in June.
Local fans can expect increased excitement and support for the team with Tatum's return.

articles.title: Derrick White, Celtics blow out Suns in second half, win fourth straight: 7 takeaways
articles.description:
The Celtics’ defense came together and formed a wall in the third, submitting one of their stingiest showings of the season to date.

The post Derrick White, Celtics blow out Suns in second half, win fourth straight: 7 takeaways appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics secured their fourth consecutive win against the Suns on February 25.
Derrick White contributed significantly to the team's strong defensive performance.
Boston residents can expect continued excitement as the Celtics improve their season record.
